articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il received gifts from the director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) and delegations of the Japanese Youth Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Mongolia Paektusan Society and the young forces forum of Nepal on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
 The gifts were handed to an official concerned by director general of the IIJI Vishwanath and heads of the delegations.    
 He also received a gift from the head of the delegation of a French organization for the study of the Juche idea.

Ugandan government delegation here
articles.content:
Ugandan government delegation here 
    Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The Ugandan government delegation headed by Kintu Musoke, senior adviser to the president, arrived here on Tuesday.
 The delegation was greeted at the airport by Kung Sok Ung, DPRK vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Folk dance suite presented
articles.content:
Folk dance suite presented 
    Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The participants of the 21st April Spring Friendship Art Festival enjoyed the folk dance suite "Song of Seasons" at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Tuesday.
 Among the audience were members of the organizing committee of the festival and Pyongyangites.    
 The performance was applauded by the audience for its high ideological value and artistic merits.
